intro: Lastrea varia, commonly known as the variable lastrea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Aizoaceae. It is native to southern Africa, particularly South Africa, where it thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and vibrant, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of yellow, orange, and red. It is often found growing on rocky outcrops and in sandy soils, adapting well to harsh, dry conditions. Due to its unique appearance and resilience, it is a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
